=Questionnaire for Applicants=

 # Say something about yourself. We want to know about your programming skills and interests in computer science or computational linguistics but we don't expect complete CV.
 # How did you find GF?
 # How did you learned about the Google Summer of Code program for GF?
 # Do you have any previous experience with GF? What did you do?
 # Why do you think, working with GF is interesting?
 # What do you want to do for your Google Summer of Code project? Why?
 # Give us some contact information (e-mail, skype, university).
